title: My data has gone
body:
I recently changed my laptop hard disk and downloaded the game and logged in. Actually I was at 12th level and when i log in now it has asked for the new summoner name and started from Level 1....
But lol messenger app is still showing the old summoner name and level 12 only...
Anyone know how to resolve and get my profile and continue from level 12 only...

I don't want to play again through all levels... really disappointing....

Please any help is appreciated

replies.body: Your account is not stored locally, we hold on to that info.  It sounds like you might be logging into another account, or maybe even different region.  Is this still an issue?
